title: [Krag Slopes, Dark Cavern]
description: The dim light that creeps into this dark cavern through the crack leading outside does little to dispel the encroaching shadows.  The floor is relatively clear except for a massive pile of rocks close to the back wall.

The dim moonlight that creeps into this dark cavern through the crack leading outside does little to dispel the encroaching darkness.  The floor is relatively clear except for a massive pile of rocks close to the back wall.
